Dif Import/Export/ Lotus import/ dBASE import

Defines the options for import/export. These dialogs will be automatically shown if the corresponding file type is selected.

Character set

Select the character set from the options used for import/export.

For further information regarding filters, refer to the topic: Information about Import and Export Filters.
